import requests

url = "https://aqeel-mashkraft-touchbase-v1.p.rapidapi.com/words/hello/synonyms?accessToken=j4d04qyNZGmshUdUIjqOJWoG3AuZp1tt0zxjsn2KQE1Wg0esvG"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aqeel-mashkraft-touchbase-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
